mapper.insert: insert into lms_lesson ( titl, conts, sdt, edt, tot_hr, day_hr ) values ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalHours}, #{dayHours} );
mapper.select: select lesson_id no, titl title, conts contents, sdt startDate, edt endDate, tot_hr totalHours, day_hr dayHours from lms_lesson
select lesson_id no, titl title, conts contents, sdt startDate, edt endDate, tot_hr totalHours, day_hr dayHours from lms_lesson where lesson_id=#{no}
mapper.update: update lms_lesson set titl = #{title}, conts = #{contents}, sdt = #{startDate}, edt = #{endDate}, tot_hr = #{totalHours}, day_hr = #{dayHours} where lesson_id =#{no}
